lead_paragraph: Three terrifying tales, one of which features Karloff as a vampire. Nothing to do with the heavy metal band. Boris Karloff introduces - and stars in one of-three terrifying tales. 'The Warlock', 'A Drop Of Water', and 'The Telephone'.
